body: i just hope chapter 2 through 9 will get posted somewhere in English soon. Chapter 2 is on nHentai but in Chinese. Looks good but it got into story and i don't know Chinese.
The swimsuit sister also gets molesred in chapter 9. Not sure what happens next there is just groping for now. Chapter 10 hasn't been released

Next chapter there is NTR. Fuck the guy. He has a girlfriend but goes after the sister. I usually like ntr if the male is the one cucked but I can't stand it the other way around. It is double standards but as a male personally I think you have a responsibility to be loyal. I just realized how biased I am. Shit. Well, I still think the male cheating is 10x worse than if the female cheats. I guess I shouod reflect and try to change my bias.
